Articles.Content: Borderless functions like Fullscreen and doesn't allow the mouse outside of the game window.  I would use windowed, but it doesn't allow off resolutions to get around this.  I assume many people use multiple monitors and this essentially monopolizes the mouse which is a no-no for extended play sessions.

Yup, same for me. Borderless mode is basically broken. I play all my games with browser windows open on other monitors. I've submitted feedback on this through the launcher, and perhaps you should too. The more the marrier
I was trying to figure out where the feedback submission was.  It's on the Launcher.  Thanks!
Okay I'm not the only one with this problem - good to know. Will submit feedback. Thank you!
